Fiction

New fiction for September 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 28, 2019

A bumper fiction crop this month, with new titles from Margaret Atwood, Ann Patchett, Robert Harris, Linwood Barclay, Jessie Burton, Laura Purcell and more.

New fiction for August 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Jul 31, 2019

New titles from Val McDermid, Ruth Ware, Deborah Levy and more.

New fiction for July 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Jun 27, 2019

New titles from David Nicholls, Jo Nesbo, Lisa Jewell and more.

New fiction for June 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published May 30, 2019

New titles from Mick Herron, Clare Mackintosh, Kate Atkinson and more.

New fiction for May 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Apr 29, 2019

New titles from Thomas Harris, Alison Weir, Victoria Hislop and more.

New fiction for April 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Mar 28, 2019

New titles from Ian McEwan, Jess Kidd, Erin Kelly and more.

New fiction for March 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Feb 28, 2019

New titles from Ali Smith, Donna Leon, Rebecca Tope and more.

New fiction for February 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Jan 31, 2019

New titles from Elly Griffiths, Tana French, Lynda La Plante and more.

New fiction for January 2019

Written by Brandon King · Published Dec 28, 2018

New titles from Peter May, Stephen Leather, Alison Bruce and more.

New fiction for December 2018

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 29, 2018

Including the new title from Suffolk favourite Kate Ellis.
